Welcome to LENER - School Admin's documentation!
================================================

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

Indices and tables
==================

* :ref:`genindex`
* :ref:`modindex`
* :ref:`search`

.. note::

   In this documentation, the terms *agentes* and *produtos* refer to specific components of the project:

   - *agentes* refers to the entities and functionality related to agents or students and teachers.
   - *produtos* refers to the entities and functionality related to products or themes, courses, and groups.

   Please keep these terms in mind when navigating the documentation.
